system.setScreen(contact)

if contact.getState()== 1 then 
    contact.deactivate() 
    timer = 6 --export warning uptime 
    system.showScreen(1)
   
end

if timer ~= nil and timer > 0 then 
    timer = timer -1 
end
if timer ~= nil and timer == 0 then system.showScreen(false) end
